title: Sherri
overview: Actress, comedienne and co-host of ABC's The View, Sherri Shepherd leaps from daytime to primetime to headline her own, all-new, multi-camera comedy series Sherri. Sherri centers around a newly single mom, paralegal and part-time comedienne/actress who tries to get back into the dating scene and move on with her life after divorcing her cheating husband. Sherri finds solace and support among her girlfriends at the office while juggling her hectic life.
